Title: Relates to the provision of criminal history background checks free of charge to mentoring programs operated by not-for-profit corporations
Summary: Relates to the provision of criminal history background checks free of charge to mentoring programs operated by not-for-profit corporations.
LawCode: Amd §390-e, Soc Serv L; amd §837, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the executive law, in relation to the provision of criminal history background checks free of charge to mentoring programs operated by not-for-profit corporations
